home.subtitle: Your path to mental and physical balance
home.pilatesLedByTherapist: Pilates led by a physical therapist
home.studioDescription: A studio opening in a prime location just 1 minute walk from Toyota Station. You can receive personal lessons from Pilates instructors certified in physical therapy.
home.feature1: Specialized lessons by instructors with physical therapy qualifications
home.feature2: Personal lessons that are safe for beginners and those who are not comfortable with exercise
home.feature4: Easy to continue because it's easy to get to! Great location near the station and free parking
home.whatHappensPilates: What happens when you do Pilates?
home.recommendedFor: Softis is recommended for these people
home.recommendation1: Your body feels stiff and somehow uncomfortable
home.recommendation2: You have shoulder, neck, back, or knee pain
home.recommendation3: You are not satisfied with your posture
home.recommendation4: You are not satisfied with group Pilates lessons or are concerned about others watching you
home.recommendation5: You want to know about your body's characteristics
home.effect1: Your body becomes appropriately flexible and you feel refreshed
home.effect3: Your posture improves and your aura changes
home.effect4: Your autonomic nervous system is regulated and your thinking becomes positive
home.effect5: You learn about your body's characteristics and what to be aware of in daily life
home.step1Description: Register for our official LINE account and apply for a trial session
home.step2Description: Visit the studio and take your first trial lesson
home.machinesDescription: At Softis, we offer the latest Pilates machines to provide exercises tailored to your body
home.reformerDescription: The iconic Pilates machine. Using spring resistance to train muscles throughout the body in a balanced way.
home.barrelDescription: A machine particularly effective for improving spine flexibility and posture. Supports the natural curve of the spine.
home.chairDescription: Effective for core stability and strengthening the upper and lower body. Also improves balance ability.
home.specialMachine1Description: A specialized machine for Pilates movements. Efficiently targets various parts of the body.
home.towerDescription: You move while freely handling moving springs on a fixed platform.
home.spineCorrectorDescription: A machine that corrects the movement and shape of the spine. For people with stiff bodies, using this curve to move the spine can make movement easier.
home.specialMachine4Description: Adjustable design that accommodates all body types and levels. Allows for training customized to you.

contact.seoTitle: Access & Contact | Pilates Studio 1 Minute Walk from Toyota Station
contact.seoDescription: How to access Softis Pilates Studio, just 1 minute walk from Toyota Station. Located on the 2nd floor of Central Building, 1-26 Wakamiya-cho, Toyota, Aichi. Free parking available.
contact.seoKeywords: access, Toyota station, 1 minute walk, Pilates studio, contact, Toyota Aichi, free parking, Meitetsu Toyota line
contact.accessSubtitle: 1 minute walk from Meitetsu Toyota Station
contact.addressLine3: Yellow building with minimini on the first floor
contact.accessDetailsLine1: Look for the Central Building as your landmark
contact.accessDetailsLine2: Use the stairs on the left side of the building to reach the 2nd floor
contact.mapTitle: 1-26 Wakamiya-cho, Toyota, Aichi Prefecture, Central Building 2nd Floor
contact.parkingDetails: Please park anywhere except the space marked 4F on the far left

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: We offer various options to meet your needs
pricing.openingCampaign: Opening campaign special offer for the first 20 customers
pricing.firstTrialDesc: Try training at a special price.
pricing.fiveTicketsDesc: Flexible tickets at an advantageous price.
pricing.tenTicketsDesc: Ideal for regular training with lasting results.
pricing.paymentOptions: Cash or credit card payment available
pricing.cashOrBankTransfer: Cash or bank transfer payment only
pricing.openingCampaignDetails: Opening campaign: special offer limited to the first 20 customers!
pricing.membershipFeeDesc: As part of our opening campaign, membership fees are free for the first 20 customers!
pricing.singleSessionDesc: Payment can be made by cash or credit card.
pricing.ticketValidity: ※ Ticket packages have an expiration date. 5 sessions → 3 months, 10 sessions → 5 months
pricing.paymentOptionsDetails: ※ First-time trial fees, membership fees, single tickets, and 5-session tickets can be paid by: cash, credit card
pricing.tenTicketPayment: ※ 10-session tickets can only be paid by cash or bank transfer (transfer fees to be borne by the customer).
pricing.cancelPolicyRule1: ・ To change or cancel a session, please do so through the reservation site by 9:00 AM the day before the session.
pricing.cancelPolicyRule2: For cancellations after this time, please contact our official LINE.
pricing.cancelPolicyRule3: In this case, 100% of the session fee will be charged or one session will be deducted from your ticket package. (Exceptions may be granted, please consult with us).

instructors.title: Our Instructors
instructors.subtitle: Softis instructors support your health with specialized knowledge and extensive experience.
instructors.greetingContent: Hello, I'm Akima Mayu, the owner of Softis. I have experience working as a physical therapist in hospitals and realized the importance of maintaining a healthy body. Through Pilates, I want to share the importance of daily body care and loving your own body.
instructors.qualification1: Physical Therapist (experience in Japan Hospital Certified Organization)
instructors.messageContent: Pilates is not just an exercise, it's a time to connect with yourself. Whether you're stiff, in pain, or concerned about your posture, it's okay. With a program tailored to your body, you'll feel changes without excessive effort. Let's celebrate your 'I did it!' moments together!
instructors.promise1Desc: Safe programs based on physical therapy knowledge
instructors.promise3Desc: Exercises that are easy to incorporate into daily life
instructors.case3: Rounded shoulders and swayback posture correction
instructors.quote:
"True health begins with listening to your body.
Let's walk together toward your 'ideal body'."

toyotaCityPilates.seoTitle: Toyota City Pilates | 1-Minute Walk From Station | Physiotherapist-Owned | Softis
toyotaCityPilates.seoDescription: Softis Pilates Studio, just 1 minute from Toyota City Station. Fully personalized Pilates lessons by certified physiotherapists for posture improvement, body sculpting, and health promotion. Safe guidance for beginners with effective training on multiple Pilates machines.
toyotaCityPilates.seoKeywords: Toyota City Pilates, Toyota City, Pilates, Softis, softis, personal training, physiotherapist, posture improvement, body sculpting, health promotion, near station
toyotaCityPilates.mainSubtitle: Great location just 1 minute walk from Toyota City Station. A fully personalized Pilates studio run by physiotherapists to balance your body and mind.
toyotaCityPilates.lookingForTitle: For Those Looking for Pilates in Toyota City
toyotaCityPilates.description1: Softis is a Pilates studio with convenient access, just 1 minute walk from Toyota City Station. With careful guidance from instructors with physiotherapist qualifications, even beginners can train with confidence.
toyotaCityPilates.description2: From body pain and posture concerns to health promotion, we offer personalized programs tailored to each individual's goals.
toyotaCityPilates.whyChooseTitle: Why Choose Us in Toyota City
toyotaCityPilates.reason1Desc: Safe and effective training is possible with guidance from physiotherapists with medical knowledge.
toyotaCityPilates.reason2Desc: Just 1 minute walk from Toyota City Station. Accessibility is an important factor.
toyotaCityPilates.reason3Desc: We provide customized programs tailored to each individual's goals and physical condition.
